item.title: CVE-2024-29125|2024-06-04T17:57:27.498Z -- elliot%20sowersby%2C%20relywp -- coupon%20affiliates
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Elliot Sowersby, RelyWP Coupon Affiliates allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Coupon Affiliates: from n/a through 5.12.7.
